import axios, { all } from "axios"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link, useNavigate, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; const UpdateJob = () => { const params = useParams(); const [check, setCheck] = useState(false); const navigate = useNavigate(); const allData = JSON.parse(params.id); const [data, id] = allData; const updateJob = data?.filter((txt) => txt.phone == id)[0]; const [user, setUser] = useState({ phone: updateJob.phone, customer_type: updateJob.customer_type, fname: updateJob.fname, lname: updateJob.lname, address: updateJob.address, locationlink: updateJob.locationlink, orgno: updateJob.orgno, orgname: updateJob.orgname, curr_date: updateJob.curr_date, curr_time: updateJob.curr_time, job_note: updateJob.job_note, driver_note: updateJob.driver_note, job_status: updateJob.job_status, assigned_to: updateJob.assigned_to, payment: updateJob.payment, amount: updateJob.amount, image_before: updateJob.image_before, image_after: updateJob.image_after, }); const userHandler = event => { setUser({ ...user, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }); if (user.customer_type == "Private") { setCheck(true); } else if (user.customer_type == "Bedrift") { setCheck(false); } } const submitHandler = async event => { event.preventDefault(); await axios.put(`http://localhost:10101/job/${id}`, user); navigate('/job'); } const closeHandler = () => { navigate('/job'); } return (

ADD JOB

) } export default UpdateJob;
